page.title: 15The Worcestershire Hunt
page.content: The Worcestershire{Hunt,}for which the Squire of Bentley was best known, (they were a hunting family) takes place from October to March. One of the{farm labourers}from Upper Bentley Farm is the earth _ stopper, preventing the fox from returning to his den. People involved in the Hunt are the Master and the hunters. There are 16 to 18 couples of hounds and 50 to 100 horses. Although the Hunt was originally intended for the local farmers, it is now mainly supported by local{business men,}who can afford the time for this{recreation. {
